spec_data.Name: igor-client
spec_data.Description:
The client is used to initiate jobs, create profiles etc. and query all sorts
of informations.
Basically it is an CLI to Igor's RESTish API.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Wed 26 Jul 2017 05:31:23 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Client to communicate with an Igor daemon
